Package ltl2rabin.LTL

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IVisitable<T>
    Interface for LTL formulas.
    IVisitor<T>
    The interface a visitor for Formula objects must implement.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    And
    This class represents a logical conjunction (&) in an LTL formula.
    Boolean
    Represents a boolean value in an LTL formula (true or false).
    F
    This class represents the F (finally) operator in LTL.
    Formula
    Base class for all LTL operands.
    G
    This class represents the G (globally) operator in LTL.
    LTLAfGVisitor
    This visitor implements the afG function for a fixed letter.
    LTLFactory<T>
    Abstract class to construct Formula objects.
    LTLFactory.Result
    This struct-like class exists for the sole purpose of returning several objects at once.
    LTLFactoryFromFile
    This is the factory that constructs an LTL formula from a file, using antlr4.
    LTLFactoryFromString
    This is the factory that constructs an LTL formula from a String, using antlr4.
    LTLFactoryWithAntlr<T>
    This abstract class indicates that the class that extends this class uses antlr4 to build a Formula.
    LTLListener
    Implementation of the BaseListener generated by antlr4.
    Or
    This class represents a logical disjunction (|) in an LTL formula.
    PropEquivalenceClass
    An object of this class represents an equivalence class of LTL formulas.
    PropEquivalenceClass.BlackHole
    This class serves as a callback class for the output of the bddFactory.
    U
    This class represents the U (until) operator in an LTL formula.
    Variable
    Represents a variable (string) with an optional negation ('!') in an LTL Formula.
    X
    This class represents the X (next) operator in LTL.
